text: Androidland is the first Android retail store, opened by the company Telstra on Bourke Street, Melbourne, Australia, in December 2011. Two more Androidland stores opened in India in 2013. ==Related pages== * Google Nexus * Galaxy Nexus ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Telstra Press Release *News of about the store at the Official Google Australia Blog *Images of the store Category:Google Category:Android (operating system) Category:2011 establishments in Australia
title: Androidland
